Privacy and Data Usage Consent

By logging into The Cyber Boardroom, you acknowledge and agree to the following terms regarding the collection and use of your personal information:

  1. Collection of Personal Information

    We collect and process the following personal data:

    • Full Name
    • Company Name
    • Job Title
    • Number of Employees
    • Country
  2. Purpose of Data Collection

    We collect this information for the following purposes:

    • To provide you with access to our services.
    • To personalize your experience on our platform.
    • To improve our services based on user feedback and behavior.
  3. Data Protection

    We are committed to protecting your privacy and adhere to the provisions of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable data protection laws.

  4. Data Sharing

    We will never sell, rent, or share your personal information with any third parties for marketing or promotional purposes without your explicit consent.

  5. Data Retention

    We will retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this consent statement or as required by applicable laws.

  6. Your Rights

    You have the right to:

    • Access the personal data we hold about you.
    • Rectify any inaccuracies in your personal data.
    • Erase your personal data (right to be forgotten), subject to legal obligations.
    • Restrict the processing of your personal data.
    • Object to the processing of your personal data.
    • Data portability.
  7. Withdrawal of Consent

    You have the right to withdraw your consent at any time. However, please note that this may impact your ability to use our services.

By clicking "Accept" or continuing to use our services, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy and Data Usage Consent statement and agree to the collection and use of your personal information as described above.
